description: Try our easy to follow Waffle Berry Pan Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Waffle Berry Pan Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop waffles and set aside. Whisk eggs, caster sugar, vanilla and cream in a large bowl until well combined. Add blueberries and waffles and gently combine.

Melt butter in a 16cm (base measurement) frying pan over low heat. Brush butter evenly over base and sides of pan. Pour waffle mixture into fry pan. Use a large metal spoon to press mixture into the pan. Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until almost set.
Preheat grill on medium heat. Combine white sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over top of pudding in pan. Place the pan under the grill for 3 minutes until the centre is set and sugar crystalised.
Spoon the pudding evenly among serving bowls and serve warm with cream.
